Packages.description: Logs number of tabs opened in Safari.
Packages.title: TabTracker

Packages.description: Makes wallpaper buttons transparent in photos app.
Packages.title: TransparentWallpaperButtons

changelog.1.0.1: Added support for ios 12 photos app.

Packages.description:
Automatically opens camera roll when launching Photos or the PhotoPicker
Issues: The PhotoPicker moves to the camera roll after a slight delay after launching
Packages.title: AutoOpenCameraRoll

Packages.description: Implements Reddit's new awards (silver and platinum) into Reddit v3.13.1 and Narwhal.
Packages.title: NewAwardsForOldReddit

Packages.description:
Creates a button that retrieves deleted or removed comments for Reddit.
Currently only supports version <= 3.13.1 of the official Reddit app.
Comments retrieved using pushshift.
Packages.title: undelete

Packages.description: A flash that lasts for 1 second after a video recording is started. Helpful with showing if remote activators actually started the video.
Packages.title: VideoFlashIndicator

Packages.description:
Adds a "ctrl + shift" like function to the Photos App when selecting photos.
Supports A12
Packages.title: PhotoCtrl
